properties.markdownProperty: Glossary handler class (`glossaryHandler`) gives support to the `glossary_highlight` XSLT function to improve performance. `glossary_highlight` is an static method of `GlossaryHandler` class. The class stores multiple information as class variables. It subscribe multiple methods to events like `AddObjectEvent`, `DeleteObjectEvent`, etc. These methods updates the information about glossary items in the project, descriptions and the matching pattern to save computational time once the static method is called during the transformation.
